sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-app-bar>
    <template v-slot:prepend>
      <v-app-bar-nav-icon @click="openNavbar"></v-app-bar-nav-icon>
    </template>
    <v-app-bar-title>todo</v-app-bar-title>
    <template v-slot:append>
      <v-btn
        :icon="darkMode ? 'mdi-weather-night' : 'mdi-white-balance-sunny'"
      ></v-btn>
    </template>
  </v-app-bar>
  <NavigationComponent ref="NavigationDrawer"></NavigationComponent>
</template>
<script>
import NavigationComponent from "@/components/NavigationDrawer.vue";
import { useTheme } from "vuetify";

export default {
  name: "HeaderComponent",
  components: {
    NavigationComponent,
  },
  data() {
    return {
      theme: useTheme(),
      darkMode: false,
    };
  },
  methods: {
    openNavbar() {
      this.$refs.NavigationDrawer.openNavbar();
    },
    changeTheme() {
      this.darkMode = !this.darkMode;
      this.theme.global.name = this.darkMode ? "darkMode" : "lightMode";
    },
  },
};
</script>
<style></style>
